subject: College Athletics
lead_paragraph: George Steinbrenner, the sports editor for the Williams Record and a halfback on the football team, wrote a scathing open letter in 1951 aimed at the Amherst coach, for which he later apologized.
snippet: George Steinbrenner, the sports editor for the Williams Record and a halfback on the football team, wrote a scathing open letter in 1951 aimed at the Amherst coach, for which he later apologized.
